Helpers

Spacing

<!--

    -----------------------------
    Examples:
    -----------------------------

    <div class="m-t-lg">Margin top: 32px</div>

    <div class="p-x-md">Padding left & right: 24px</div>









-->
<p>Spacing converts the following pixel values to rem values.</p>
<table class="f-table" style="width: auto;">
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left">Name</th>
			<th class="f-text-right">px</th>
			<th></th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left f-text-middle">xxs</th>
			<td class="f-text-right f-text-middle">4</td>
			<td class="f-text-middle">
				<div class="f-spacing f-spacing-xxs"></div>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left f-text-middle">xs</th>
			<td class="f-text-right f-text-middle">8</td>
			<td class="f-text-middle">
				<div class="f-spacing f-spacing-xs"></div>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left f-text-middle">sm</th>
			<td class="f-text-right f-text-middle">16</td>
			<td class="f-text-middle">
				<div class="f-spacing f-spacing-sm"></div>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left f-text-middle">md</th>
			<td class="f-text-right f-text-middle">24</td>
			<td class="f-text-middle">
				<div class="f-spacing f-spacing-md"></div>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left f-text-middle">lg</th>
			<td class="f-text-right f-text-middle">32</td>
			<td class="f-text-middle">
				<div class="f-spacing f-spacing-lg"></div>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left f-text-middle">xl</th>
			<td class="f-text-right f-text-middle">48</td>
			<td class="f-text-middle">
				<div class="f-spacing f-spacing-xl"></div>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th class="f-text-left f-text-middle">xxl</th>
			<td class="f-text-right f-text-middle">64</td>
			<td class="f-text-middle">
				<div class="f-spacing f-spacing-xxl"></div>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
<div>
	<h2>Usage</h2>
	<h5>Where property is one of:</h5>
	<ul>
		<li><kbd>m</kbd> - for setting margin</li>
		<li><kbd>p</kbd> - for setting padding</li>
	</ul>
	<h5>Where side is one of:</h5>
	<ul>
		<li><kbd>t</kbd> - for setting margin-top or padding-top</li>
		<li><kbd>r</kbd> - for setting margin-right or padding-right</li>
		<li><kbd>b</kbd> - for setting margin-bottom or padding-bottom</li>
		<li><kbd>l</kbd> - for setting margin-left or padding-left</li>
		<li><kbd>x</kbd> - for setting margin-left & margin-right or padding-left & padding-right</li>
		<li><kbd>y</kbd> - for setting margin-top & margin-bottom or padding-bottom & padding-bottom</li>
	</ul>
	<h5>Where size is one of:</h5>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>0</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> for removing margin or padding</li>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>xxs</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> 4</li>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>xs</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> 8</li>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>sm</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> 16</li>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>md</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> 24</li>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>lg</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> 32</li>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>xl</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> 48</li>
		<li><span style="width: 30px; display: inline-block;"><kbd>xxl</kbd></span> <span style="width: 15px; display: inline-block;">-</span> 64</li>
	</ul>
</div>

Spacing converts the following pixel values to rem values.

Name px
xxs 4
xs 8
sm 16
md 24
lg 32
xl 48
xxl 64

Usage

Where property is one of:
  • m - for setting margin
  • p - for setting padding
Where side is one of:
  • t - for setting margin-top or padding-top
  • r - for setting margin-right or padding-right
  • b - for setting margin-bottom or padding-bottom
  • l - for setting margin-left or padding-left
  • x - for setting margin-left & margin-right or padding-left & padding-right
  • y - for setting margin-top & margin-bottom or padding-bottom & padding-bottom
Where size is one of:
  • 0 - for removing margin or padding
  • xxs - 4
  • xs - 8
  • sm - 16
  • md - 24
  • lg - 32
  • xl - 48
  • xxl - 64

Text Helpers

<div data-dna="text-helpers">
	<div class="bg-gray-light brd-1 brdc-gray-dark txt--align--left">
		<h4>ClassName .txt--align--left</h4>
		<p class="m-b-xs gotham-bold">Text Aligned Left</p>
	</div>
	<div class="bg-gray-light brd-1 brdc-gray-dark m-t-sm txt-align--center">
		<h4>ClassName .txt-align--center</h4>
		<p class="m-b-xxs gotham-bold">Text Aligned Center</p>
	</div>
	<div class="txt--align--right bg-gray-light brd-1 brdc-gray-dark m-t-sm">
		<h4>ClassName .txt--align--right</h4>
		<p class="m-b-xxs gotham-bold">Text Aligned Right</p>
	</div>
	<div class="m-t-sm">
		<h4><strong>ClassName .capitalize</strong></h4>
		<p class="m-b-xxs capitalize">Tesque eu elit ac elit feugiat dignissim etiam elementum eu mauris id interdum interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus maecenas.</p>
	</div>
	<div class="m-t-sm">
		<h4><strong>ClassName .uppercase</strong></h4>
		<p class="m-b-xxs uppercase">Venenatis euismod fermentum pellentesque et egestas dui nam at suscipit ligula suspendisse potenti donec at lectus elit suspendisse potenti pellentesq.</p>
	</div>
	<div class="m-t-sm">
		<h4><strong>ClassName .lowercase</strong></h4>
		<p class="m-b-xxs lowercase">Lesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus sed ac posuere quam sit amet tristique mauris nullam facilisis cursus aliquam nunc sagittis est sapien.</p>
	</div>
	<div class="m-t-sm">
		<h4><strong>ClassName .nowrap</strong></h4>
		<p class="m-b-xxs nowrap">Massa fermentum tincidunt sed mauris ex ultricies ut dui id mattis volutpat orci praesent ornare consequat ante in commodo pellentesque ut porta sem.</p>
	</div>
</div>

ClassName .txt--align--left

Text Aligned Left

ClassName .txt-align--center

Text Aligned Center

ClassName .txt--align--right

Text Aligned Right

ClassName .capitalize

La finibus condimentum orci odio rhoncus nisl congue dapibus orci nisi id mi pellentesque eget enim vitae dolor tempus mattis congue sit amet neque.

ClassName .uppercase

Ec luctus vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia curae pellentesque et viverra risus vitae ornare elit nulla.

ClassName .lowercase

Porta luctus elit nec luctus nunc sit amet justo a lectus bibendum hendrerit aenean egestas feugiat velit vel rutrum nibh varius non suspendisse nec.

ClassName .nowrap

A non varius porttitor est nibh imperdiet leo non elementum lorem massa quis orci vestibulum vestibulum hendrerit urna laoreet luctus in odio purus.

Display Helpers

<div data-dna="display-helpers">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">ClassName .visible-block</p>
		</div>
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">display: block</p>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">ClassName .visible-inline</p>
		</div>
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">display: inline</p>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">ClassName .visible-inline-block</p>
		</div>
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">display: inline-block</p>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">ClassName .visible-flex</p>
		</div>
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">display: flex</p>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">ClassName .invisible</p>
		</div>
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">display: none</p>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="row">
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">ClassName .full-size</p>
		</div>
		<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 brd-1 brdc-gray-dark bg-gray-lighter txt-align--center">
			<p class="m-t-xs m-b-xs">width: 100% , display:block</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

ClassName .visible-block

display: block

ClassName .visible-inline

display: inline

ClassName .visible-inline-block

display: inline-block

ClassName .visible-flex

display: flex

ClassName .invisible

display: none

ClassName .full-size

width: 100% , display:block

<section>
	<h4>Offset Column</h4>
	<h6 class="m-b-sm">* is xs,sm,md,lg</h6>
	<div class="container f-grid-demo">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-11 col-sm-1 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-12</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-10 col-sm-2 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-11</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-9 col-sm-3 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-9</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-8 col-sm-4 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-8</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-7 col-sm-5 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-7</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-6</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-5 col-sm-7 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-5</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-4 col-sm-8 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-4</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-3 col-sm-9 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-3</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-sm-offset-2 col-sm-10 col-xs-offset-0 col-xs-12">.col-*-offset-2</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row">

</section>

<section>
	<h4>Reordering</h4>
	<div class="container-fluid f-grid-demo">
		.first-
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">1</div>
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">2</div>
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4 first-sm">3</div>
		</div>
		.last-
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4 last-sm">1</div>
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">2</div>
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">3</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>

<section>
	<h4>Reversing</h4>
	<div class="container-fluid f-grid-demo">
		.reverse
		<div class="row reverse">
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">1</div>
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">2</div>
			<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">3</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>

Colors

<p>You can use any of the colors defined below within .less files: @primary or in markup:</p>
<table class="f-table">
	<col width="10%">
	<col width="25%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td class="nowrap">.txt-COLOR</td>
			<td class="nowrap">For setting the `text-color`</td>
			<td>.txt-primary</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td class="nowrap">.bg-COLOR</td>
			<td class="nowrap">For setting the `background-color`</td>
			<td>.bg-gray</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td class="nowrap">.brdc-t/r/b/l-COLOR</td>
			<td class="nowrap">For setting the `border-color`</td>
			<td>.brdc-secondary / .brdc-b-secondary</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

You can use any of the colors defined below within .less files: @primary or in markup:

.txt-COLOR For setting the `text-color` .txt-primary
.bg-COLOR For setting the `background-color` .bg-gray
.brdc-t/r/b/l-COLOR For setting the `border-color` .brdc-secondary / .brdc-b-secondary
